html: trees…shall be few. Dry, dead trees (the wicked; Luke 23:31; 3 Ne. 14:17-18; D&C 135:6) will be consumed by the Lord's glory, and the green trees (the righteous; Ps. 1:3; Zech. 4:8-14; D&C 135:6) will survive, though they may be singed. The trees (righteous people) that remain will be so few that even a little child will be able to count and list them.
